io.confluent.ksql.reactive

Class BasePublisher<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.confluent.ksql.reactive.BasePublisher<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the element
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockingQueryPublisher, BufferedPublisher, TestQueryPublisher

    public abstract class BasePublisher<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>
    Base class for our reactive streams publishers

      • beforeOnNext

        protected boolean beforeOnNext()
        Hook to allow subclasses to inject errors etc. This will be called before onNext is called on the subscriber to deliver an element
        Returns:
        true if processing should continue
